Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review the testing strategy established by the QA team.
Set up the testing environment for the critical features of the game, ensuring all necessary tools and software are ready.
Execute test cases for player movement mechanics, observing and documenting performance.
Continue executing test cases focusing on shooting mechanics and weapons functionality.
Begin identifying and documenting any bugs or inconsistencies found during the testing.
Compile a preliminary report of findings and prepare to communicate them with the development team.
